caption:
Free Airdrop Potential: Get In Early! 

Meet Pi Squared

Pi Squared [
@Pi_Squared_Pi2
] is building FastSet, a settlement layer that handles over 100,000 transactions per second with finality in under 100 ms.

It is designed to scale Web3, AI, and cross-chain apps on standard hardware without the usual blockchain slowdowns.

- Raised $12.5M in funding
- Backed by Polychain Capital, Robot Ventures, and others

--------------

 Pi Squared Portal is now live!

You can complete simple quests and play the Pi2 Reactor game (coming soon) to earn points for free.

There is no official info yet on how points will be used, but chances are high this will lead to an airdrop.

 How to participate:

1. Visit the portal: https://portal.pi2.network
2. Log in with your email address
3. Set up your username
4. Open the Quests section
5. Complete all available quests

Note: To finish the follow task, your X account must be verified.

Quiz Answers: 
- Quiz 1: No
- Quiz 2: Above 100,000
- Quiz 3: None, because FastSet validator don't...

The Pi2 Reactor game is expected to launch in about 5 days. Once it goes live, you will be able to play it, stress test the Pi Squared infrastructure, and earn points as rewards.
